name: Procedural Bunny Dungeon
description:
3D kill all of the Dungeon bunny rabbits in 90 seconds to win. Each time you kill a bunny, its ghost appears and comes to haunt you!

This game was my first venture into 3D and the free Unity asset store 'Procedural level generator'. It was done as part of the GameDevTV Game Jam https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-jam-2022. It was done in around 15h total development over a course of 10 days. The theme for the game was given by the GameDevTV crew: 'Death is only the beginning'.

https://itch.io/embed-upload/5887175?color=333333 to Play now!
